entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow after midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
